name: Tier 4 Melee Critical Hits (Levels 13-20)
description: Critical hit effects for melee attacks at Tier 4 (Levels 13-20). Legendary effects for legendary adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Annihilating Blow - Your strike is utterly devastating. Target is stunned for 1 round. (GM: also apply prone and 2d6 bonus damage)
Mortal Wound - Your strike opens a mortal wound. Target takes 3d6 damage at the start of each turn. DC 15 Medicine check or magical healing stops the bleeding.
Armor Damaged - Your attack damages their armor. -2 AC until repaired by a skilled smith.
Organ Strike - Your blade pierces vital organs. Target must make DC 18 Con save or be stunned for 1 round.
Legendary Devastation - Your legendary strike deals an additional 4d6 damage.
Crippling Wound - Your devastating blow cripples a limb (DM's choice). Target has disadvantage on relevant checks until healed with Regenerate or similar magic.
Near-Fatal Blow - If the target has 50 HP or fewer, they must make a DC 20 Con save or drop to 0 HP.

dorman-lakelys-crit-fumble-tables.failEffect: Drop to 0 HP if under 50 HP
